title: Game freezes in champion select
body: When it was last pick for the enemy enemy team they ran the timer to zero and it stayed there, the music still played. But on my friend's screen it was my turn to pick but I couldn't pick.

replies.body:
When this happens in champ select, it's usually because your client has stopped receiving data from the server, which is often the result of a poor connection to it. Most of the time a poor connection to the server can be a resolved by aligning your local settings with those in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if there was any change to your issue with those steps.
